item.description:
Think Again - Marketing Beyond Social Media

When: Tuesday, January 10, 2012, 5:30 - 8:30 PM, program begins at 6:00 PM

Where: WPI Campus Center - 3rd Floor

Register: http://www.wpiventureforum.org

 

With all the media coverage on social media and inbound marketing, it's easy for entrepreneurs to think that throwing some thoughts in a blog or Tweet are all it takes to conquer a market. Think again. Successful marketing involves a strategy that begins with knowing your target customer and what they value, then ensuring your product addresses those needs.

 

Keynote Speaker: Nitzan Shaer, Managing Partner, High Start Group

 

The keynote speaker for the January 10th WPI Venture Forum meeting, Nitzan Shaer of High Start Group, understands that marketing is more than clever Tweets and pretty banner ads. He will help attendees see where social media fits into a company's marketing strategy. Shaer is Managing Partner and Co-founder of High Start Group, a product strategy consulting firm.

 

Case Presentation: Solid Access Technologies

 

Solid Access Technologies has gained initial market entry for offering the fastest storage technology in the world with a high I/O rate [SSD DRAM] storage product used by well-known companies worldwide including Deutsche Borse Group (the German Stock Exchange), State Street Bank, NOAA, T-Systems and Samsung Securities. Tomas Harvda, Co-founder, will be making the case presentation for this Newburyport, Mass.-based company which has bootstrapped development without outside financing.
item.name: Think Again - Marketing Beyond Social Media
